message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $12000 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $9000?

I understand that $12000 might be a bit steep for you, Bob. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $11000. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really appreciate the value this product brings. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $9500?

I understand that $11000 is still a bit out of your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I can offer it to you for $10800. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product. What do you think?
I'm getting close, but I'm still not quite there. Would you be willing to consider a price of $9200?
I'm willing to make one more concession, Bob. I can offer it to you for $10500. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really appreciate the value this product brings. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. Would you be willing to consider a price of $9000?

I'm not willing to go any lower than $10000, Bob. I think that's a fair price for the value this product brings. If you're not willing to meet me at that price, I'm afraid I'll have to consider other options. What do you think?
